import { Link, useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' import { FaSignInAlt, FaSignOutAlt, FaUser } from 'react-icons/fa' ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////// import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { logoutUser, reset, selectUser } from '../features/auth/authSlice' const Header = () => { const dispatch = useDispatch() const navigate = useNavigate() const handleClick = () => { dispatch(logoutUser()) dispatch(reset()) localStorage.removeItem('user') navigate('/login') } return (
